#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;

int main(){
//	char arr1[1001];
//	char arr2[1001];
	string arr1;
	string arr2;
	int count[27];
	int i,l1,l2;
	cin >> arr1 >> arr2;
	l1 = arr1.size();
	l2 = arr2.size();
//	cout << l1 << ' ' << l2 << endl;
	for( int i = 0 ; i < 26 ; i++ ){
		count[i] = 0;
	}
	for( int i = 0 ; i < l1 ; i++ ){
		count[arr1[i]-'a']++;
	}
	for( int i = 0 ; i < l2 ; i++ ){
		count[arr2[i]-'a'] = 0;
	}
	for( int i = 0 ; i < 26 ; i++ ){
		if(count[i] != 0){
			printf("%c%d",i+'a',count[i]);
		}
	}
	cout << endl;
	return 0;
}
